column3:
Empresses in the Palace—the Legend of Zhen Huan
Adapted from the novel by Liu Lian Zi
column6:
Empresses in the Palace—the Legend of Zhen Huan
Adapted from the novel by Liu Lian Zi

Translators: The Magpie Bridge Brigade 鹊桥小队翻译组
https://magpiebridgebrigade.cn
Twitter/FB/IG @BrigadeMagpie 公众号/微博: 鹊桥小队翻译组
Theme: Unfortunate Love

column3:
Perturbed by the thoughts on my mind
no matter how hard I try to sever my love.
column6:
I can cut a thousand strands of hair
but I cannot sever the tangled threads of my mind.

column3: I could give away my crown for the beauty by my side,
column6:
Bowing with my hands clasped, I give away my throne.
Lowering my head, devoted to the beauty by my side.

column3:
but the wheel of fortune turns weals into woes,
and woes into weals.
column6:
The wheel of fate turns, granting blessings or misfortune.
Will it be destiny’s trial or reward?

column3:
No one is the master of their own destiny,
the vicissitudes throughout their life.
column6:
Heaven’s will cannot be known,
weaving together weals and woes.

column3:
For the lovers of all time,
who can break the spell of romance?
column6:
For lovers caught in eternal time,
who can break the spell of romance?

column3: I could give away my crown for the beauty by my side,
column6:
Bowing with my hands clasped, I give away my throne.
Lowering my head, devoted to the beauty by my side.

column3:
but the wheel of fortune turns weals into woes,
and woes into weals.
column6:
The wheel of fate turns, granting blessings or misfortune.
Will it be destiny’s trial or reward?

column3:
No one is the master of their own destiny,
the vicissitudes throughout their life.
column6:
Heaven’s will cannot be known,
weaving together weals and woes.

column3:
For the lovers of all time,
who can break the spell of romance?
column6:
For lovers caught in eternal time,
who can break the spell of romance?

column3: Who can break the spell of romance?
column6: Who can break the spell of romance?

Translators: The Magpie Bridge Brigade 鹊桥小队翻译组
https://magpiebridgebrigade.cn
Twitter/FB/IG @BrigadeMagpie 公众号/微博: 鹊桥小队翻译组
I bid Your Majesty goodbye.
What happened to your face?

column3: 是奴婢自己做错了事情
column6: It was my own blunder.
Petunia, stop watering the plants.

column3: 去把这个月的份例拿来
column6: Go collect the stipend for this month.
Yes.
Petunia.
Where are you going?
Madam, Jade instructed me
to collect the stipend from the Household Department.

column3: 是吗 我也要去呢 一起吧
column6:
Oh? That's where I'm headed too.
Let's go together.

column3: 礼部给公主定了三个封号
column6:
The Ministry of Rites has selected
three honorary names for the princess.
Which one do you like?

column3: 礼部自然是挑好的字眼来凑
column6: The Ministry of Rites always selects excellent names.
They are equally good.
The princess has a calm quiet temperament.

column3: 倒是弘瞻只怕是个顽皮的
column6: But I'm afraid Hongyan might be a naughty child.

column3: 朕倒觉得皇子活泼开朗些好
column6: In fact, I believe it's good for a prince to be rambunctious and outgoing.
Unlike Hongshi, who is always so cheerless, like an old man.

column3: 见了朕就像老鼠见了猫
column6: He acts like a mouse before a cat when he sees me.
Your Majesty chooses to be an exacting father.
You can't blame the child for being intimidated.

column3: 朕答应你在他们面前只做慈父
column6:
I promise you I will be only a kind father
in front of our children.
You should give serious thought to

column3: 咱们的公主择个名号才是
column6: selecting the honorary name for our princess.

"Although we have not the wings of a colorful phoenix,
our hearts are connected by the divine rhino's horn."

column3: 公主的封号便叫灵犀可好
column6:
For the princess's honorary name,
how about the rhino's horn: "Lingxi"?
Lingxi.
Lingxi.

column3: 朕与你十年来心有灵犀
column6:
For the past ten years, our hearts
have been connected as one.

column3: 咱们的女儿就是灵犀公主
column6: So, our daughter is Princess Lingxi.
Your Majesty, My Lady,

column3: 阿哥和公主到了该喂奶的时候了
column6: it's time for the prince and princess to be nursed.
The wet nurse will escort them out.
Very well.
Yes.
That girl has been with you for several years.

column3: 倒是长得与你有几分相似了
column6:
She bears a resemblance to you
now that she has grown older.
Your Majesty has said this before.

column3: 说沈碧的眼睛长得像臣妾
column6: You said Jade has similar eyes to mine.

column3: 从前浣碧只是有几分姿色罢了
column6: Jade was only of middling beauty before.
Although her eyes were like yours,

column3: 也是个只知穿红着绿的丫头
column6:
she was just a girl who adorned herself
"all over with red and green."
Now that she has gotten older,

column3: 在气韵上倒与你有几分相似
column6: her temperament has grown more like yours.
What has gotten into Your Majesty today?

column3: 对着臣妾的一个侍女这样称赞
column6: You keep on praising a maid like this.
It will provoke the laughter of others.

column3: 做额娘的人了反而小气起来
column6: You are a mother now, but you become even more like a child.

column3: 沈碧若不是你的近身侍女
column6: If Jade were not your favored maid,

column3: 朕还未必肯说这几句话
column6: I might not even bother to give this compliment.

column3: 不过是看见浣碧想起胧月来
column6: It was only that her growth reminded me of Longyue.
Longyue is growing up by the day.
She looks quite like you now.
When Longyue gets older,
I will allow her to return here
so that mother and daughter are no longer separated.

column3: 胧月喜欢这个小兔子吗
column6: Longyue, do you like this little bunny?
Mother, I'd like a little tiger.

column3: 小老虎太难剪了 额娘不会呀
column6:
Oh dear, it's too difficult to cut out a little tiger.
I don't know how to make one.

column3: 额娘都会额娘什么都会
column6:
Mother, you can make anything.
You know everything.

column3: 好 为了我家胧月 额娘什么都会
column6: Of course, I can do anything for my Longyue.
I will learn how to make a little tiger.
Peace to Your Highness.
You may rise.
I thank Your Highness.
Her Noble Highness says
she hasn't had a chance to see you recently.
Since the weather is very nice today,

column3: 想要娘娘到永寿宫去一聚呢
column6:
she invites Your Highness to join her
at the Palace of Eternal Longevity.

column3: 好 你先去吧 我即刻就去
column6:
Very well, you may return first.
I will be there shortly.
Yes.

column3: 娘娘 要带着公主过去吗
column6: Your Highness, will you take the princess with you?

column3: 胧月 你在这里等着额娘
column6: Longyue, stay here and wait for me.
I'll be back soon.
Lull the princess to sleep. I'll return soon.
Yes.
Consort Estime has arrived.
Your Noble Highness.
Estime, have a seat.
I finally have some time to myself today.

column3: 咱们姐妹好好说说话吧
column6: We sisters finally have some time to catch up.

column3: 贵妃娘娘喜得龙凤双子
column6:
Your Noble Highness just gave birth
to "a dragon and a phoenix"

column3: 又要应付宫里的礼仪琐事
column6:
and have to deal with the
burdensome etiquette and palace affairs.
I dare not come and disturb you.

column3: 姐姐如今都称我娘娘了
column6: Estime, you are calling me "Noble Highness" now.
It seems we might have become estranged.
You are being courteous, Lumière,
but there is a difference between inferior and superior.

You are the second Noble Consort
after Noble Consort Fleur.
This title is truly well deserved.
In regards to merit and experience,

column3: 难道姐姐就做不得贵妃吗
column6: are you not also deserving of this title?
Even so, not all Noble Consorts are the same.
I remember that after you left the palace,
His Majesty once mentioned
how he first met you in the Imperial Garden.

column3: 他赞妹妹莞尔一笑 嫣然无方
column6:
He could not cease praising your beautiful smile,
and said nothing in this world could describe it.

column3: 这些年皇上对妹妹是念念不忘啊
column6: His Majesty had never forgotten you all those years.

column3: 年轻的时候谁不是容色倾城
column6: "One glance at a youthful lady can bring an entire city to its knees."
But that beauty "withers in the snap of a finger."

column3: 不过是眼睁睁看着君恩如流水

column6:
One can do nothing but watch His Majesty's favor
flow away like a running river - the water of no return.

column3: 后宫中的女人过得好 过得不好
column6:
In the harem, some women's lives flourish,
while others' wither,
but ultimately, all of us live the same life.

column3: 好在皇上心里是有妹妹的
column6: It's fortunate that His Majesty has you in his heart.

You've always been wise, Estime, and able
to see everything as clearly as a bright flame.

column3: 既然明知皇上对我不薄
column6: Since you know that His Majesty treats me generously,

column3: 姐姐又为何要与我作对呢
column6: then why do you choose to go against me?
You've found out about it.
It was you who told the Empress
about Jinxi and Su Peisheng.
They are both discreet,

column3: 便是那枚柳叶合心的缨络
column6:
and the only evidence was that sachet
embroidered with willow leaves.

column3: 曾被姐姐看出是槿汐的手艺
column6: You recognized that it was Jinxi's work.

column3: 除了我 唯有你和眉庄
column6: Only you and Meizhuang were present, aside from me.

column3: 姐姐曾出入景仁宫次数不少
column6:
Also, at that time you frequently visited
 the Palace of Great Benevolence.
Your Noble Highness has a brilliant mind.

column3: 既然已经知道 何苦又来问我呢
column6:
Why would you ask me
when you already know this?
It's good that you know now.

column3: 省得我终日悬心 寝食难安
column6:
It will save me from a troubled conscience
 when I eat and sleep.

column3: 这次是我害你终是我对你不住
column6: I was the one who harmed you this time.
I owe you an apology.

column3: 姐姐不争圣宠 又甚少与人交恶
column6:
You never compete for His Majesty's favor,
and seldom run afoul of anyone.

column3: 当年华妃独大时亦可忍辱保身
column6:
Even when Consort Fleur was in power,
you were able to endure her and protect yourself.

column3: 不过是想留住胧月在身边
column6: You only did this to keep Longyue by your side.
If not for Longyue,

column3: 我这后半生怕无半点欢愉了
column6: I would have no moment of joy for the rest of my life.

column3: 妹妹 你自服侍皇上 圣宠优渥
column6:
Lumière, you've been deeply in His Majesty's favor
 ever since you first served him.

column3: 哪里知道我这深宫寂寞的感觉
column6: How would you know the loneliness I feel in my desolate palace?
You know what?

column3: 我宫里一共有三百二十六块砖石
column6: There are three hundred and twenty-six masonry stones in my palace.
I've touched each and every one of them thousands of times.

And I know that fine cracks have appeared
on thirty-one of them.

column3: 已经出现了细碎的裂纹
否则我将如何度过这漫漫长夜呢
column6: How else could I get through the endless nights?
In fact, I knew from the beginning

column3: 我不过是皇上制衡华妃的
column6:
that I was only His Majesty's pawn
to check Consort Fleur's influence.
You've never told me such things before, Estime.

column3: 那时候你把胧月托付给我
column6: When you entrusted me with Longyue,
I wished to depend on her for the rest of my life,

column3: 二则是想打发这长夜寂寞
column6: and to have some company to pass the lonesome nights.
All these years,

column3: 我一直将胧月视为我亲生骨肉
column6: I've always considered Longyue to be my own flesh and blood.

column3: 我从来没有想过你会回来
column6: I never imagined that you would return...
that you could ever come back!
Estime, did you know that

I did not learn of your visits to the
Palace of Great Benevolence through my own inquiries.

column3: 而是皇后故意透露此事
column6: This information was deliberately revealed by the Empress.
If she truly wished to support you,

column3: 自然不会让任何人知晓
column6: this information would have stayed secret.

Yet, for seemingly no reason at all,
it was passed on to me.
You don't need to think hard to understand why.

column3: 皇后是故意让你知道的
column6: The Empress let you know intentionally.
She wants us to eliminate each other.
Lumière, please believe me.
It's not that I wanted to hurt you.

I just wanted Longyue to
stay by my side for a few more years.
Just a few more years.
I told the Empress,

column3: 只干这一次 唯这一次
column6: I would do this just once. Only once.
But even so,

column3: 我还是掉入皇后的股掌之中
column6: I still fell into her masterful hands.

column3: 无论是借你的手扳倒我
column6: Whether it is me bringing you down, or vice versa,

column3: 对于皇后而言都是有益无害的
column6: the Empress benefits either way.

column3: 姐姐未必没有想得周全
column6: It might not have been your lack of foresight -

column3: 只是为了胧月才不得不冒险行事
column6: you felt you had to take the risk because of Longyue.

column3: 慈母之心真可叫人盲了眼睛
column6: A mother's love can truly blind one's eyes and cloud one's mind.
It was either you, or the Empress.
I had no other choice.

column3: 事已至此 我无话可说
column6: At this point, I have nothing more to say.
I am at the mercy of Your Noble Highness.

column3: 那么就请姐姐替我抚育胧月
column6: Then Estime,
please raise Longyue for me until she marries.
But...

column3: 可 可是胧月是你亲生骨肉
column6: but Longyue is your own daughter!
Why would you ...

column3: 弘瞻与灵犀已叫我自顾不暇
column6: Hongyan and Lingxi occupy all the time I have.
Longyue sees you as her mother.

column3: 我若强行把她养在身边
column6: If I force her to live with me,
that would truly break our bond as mother and daughter.
Hearing you say this,
I will love and care for Longyue with all my strength.
Your wholehearted devotion to Longyue

column3: 即便我这个生母也自叹不如
column6: makes me incomparable to you despite being her birth mother.
By helping me raise Longyue,

column3: 等于在帮我保全这三个孩子
column6: you are helping me protect all three of my children.
Thank you.

column3: 奉天承运 皇帝诏曰
column6: By the grace of Heaven, His Majesty decrees:

column3: 丕昭淑惠 敬慎持躬
column6:
“Consort Lumière of the Niohuru family demonstrates brilliant honor and virtue,
and upholds herself with great modesty and prudence.

column3: 仰承皇太后慈谕晋为熹贵妃
column6:
At Her Majesty the Empress Dowager’s benevolent behest,
I hereby grant her the title of Noble Consort Lumière.”
This is His Majesty’s decree.
I thank Your Majesty for the heavenly grace.

This is the golden book and golden seal of the Noble Consort
for Your Noble Highness's reverent acceptance.
I thank His Majesty.
His Majesty the Emperor.

- Peace and grace to Your Majesty.
- Rise.
I thank Your Majesty.
What brings Your Majesty here?
I couldn't wait to see you.
Instead of waiting at the Palace of Great Benevolence,
I would much rather accompany you there.

column3: 今日盛礼愈发不能失了礼数
column6:
The more magnificent the ceremony,
the more the ceremonial procedures must be followed.

column3: 皇上请上轿辇 臣妾随行就是
column6: Please ride in the sedan chair. I shall follow Your Majesty.

column3: 嬛嬛时时不忘却辇之德吗
column6:
Huan Huan, you always remember the
Han Dynasty etiquette of declining the sedan.

column3: 从前不敢忘的如今更不敢忘
column6: That which I cherish I will never forget.

column3: 你也是和朕说这般的话
column6:
You said the same thing to me when we were
leaving for the Hot Spring Palace.
Your Majesty still remembers?
I shall never forget.
Noble Consort Lumière of the Niohuru family.
By the grace of Heaven's decree to the palace,

column3: 望今后修德自恃和睦宫闱
column6: may you cultivate virtue and bring peace to the imperial harem.

May you diligently serve His Majesty and
expand the imperial family.
I am delighted to obey Your Majesty's advice.

column3: 熹贵妃聪颖明慧善识大体
column6:
Noble Consort Lumière has a brilliant intellect
and a perceptive mind.

column3: 皇后的身子一直不大好
column6: Since you have not been in very good health,
you should take some time to recuperate.

column3: 朕打算将协理六宫之权
column6:
I plan to give Noble Consort Lumière the authority
to assist in palace management.

column3: 宫中琐事皆由她来打理
column6: She will take care of all the trivial matters in the palace.
What are your thoughts on this?

column3: 只是臣妾虽然身体有些不适
column6:
It is certainly a good thing.
But although I have not been feeling well,

column3: 可熹贵妃也要照料一双儿女
column6: Noble Consort Lumière has to take care of her newborns

and soon Princess Longyue will return
to the Palace of Eternal Longevity.

column3: 只怕熹贵妃会忙不过来
column6:
I'm concerned that Noble Consort Lumière
won't have time to manage everything,
with such additional burden on her responsibilities.
I've already discussed this with Noble Consort Lumière.

column3: 觉得胧月由敬妃抚养甚好
column6:
We have agreed it would be best for Consort Estime
to continue raising Longyue.
There is no need to move her away.

column3: 弘瞻和灵犀就由乳母照料
column6: As for Hongyan and Lingxi, their nursemaids take care of them.

column3: 熹贵妃费不了多少功夫
column6: Noble Consort Lumière won't have much to attend to.
It seems like my concerns were unnecessary.

column3: 只不过熹贵妃头次料理后宫之事
column6:
But this is the first time that Noble Consort Lumière
would be managing palace affairs.

column3: 这些事说多不多 说小也不小
column6: These matters may seem trivial but are numerous.
To help ease the burden, how about...
Your Majesty is right.

column3: 不如诸位姐姐阅历丰富
column6:
Compared to the concubines senior to me,
I am young and inexperienced.
Consort Honnête entered the family the earliest,

and Consort Estime assisted Your Majesty
with palace affairs for many years.

column3: 臣妾很愿意向两位姐姐讨教问询
column6: I am more than willing to ask them for advice.
It's wonderful that you feel that way.

column3: 皇后还有什么要叮嘱熹贵妃的吗
column6:
Do you have any more advice for
Noble Consort Lumière?

column3: 熹贵妃以后你是妃嫔之首
column6:
Noble Consort Lumière,
now that you are the head of concubines,
you must be diligent in managing the palace affairs

as well as serving His Majesty to
add a few more heirs to the imperial family.
Your Majesty has personally educated me.
I will not disappoint Your Majesty's expectations.

column3: 跪久了膝盖疼快起来吧
column6:
Your knees will hurt from kneeling for too long.
You may rise.
I thank Your Majesty.

column3: 好好地用你的熹贵妃金宝
column6: Make good use of your golden seal.
It's no longer just a cold block of gold.
Your Majesty, I'm going to get changed.

May I ask Your Majesty and Noble Consort Lumière
to go ahead to the Palace of Layered Brilliance

column3: 先去重华宫接受妃嫔叩拜吧
column6: to accept the ceremonial respects from the concubines?

column3: 郎情似酒热妾谊如丝柔
column6:
"A man's passion is strong as warm liquor;
a woman's affection is soft as tender silk."

column3: 酒热有时冷丝柔无断绝
column6:
"The heated liquor can grow cold,
 but the tender silk is never severed."

column3: 臣妾但愿皇上待熹贵妃之心
column6:
My wish is that Your Majesty will treat
Noble Consort Lumière like that unsevered silk.
Please drink up, Your Majesty.
Well said!
Congratulations to Noble Consort Lumière.
Congratulations to Noble Consort Lumière.
All may be seated.
I'll join you in your palace tonight.

column3: 今日是弘瞻 灵犀满月
column6:
Today is the one-month anniversary
of Hongyan and Lingxi's birth.

column3: 臣妾怕胧月这个做姐姐的会吃醋
column6: I am afraid their older sister Longyue will be jealous.

column3: 去敬妃姐姐宫里陪胧月
column6:
Why doesn't Your Majesty spend some time with Longyue
in Consort Estime's palace on my behalf?
Longyue will definitely feel happy.
Just as well.

column3: 总不能叫胧月觉得有了弟妹
column6:
I can't let Longyue feel like I'm neglecting her
now that she has a little brother and sister.

My Lady, this is for you to nourish your hands.
It is top-quality rose water.
Your hands will become fragrant and soft.
Where are Hongyan and Lingxi?
The nursemaids are nursing them.

column3: 娘娘这贺礼实在是太多了
column6: Your Highness, there are so many congratulatory gifts.

column3: 一时半会儿还真挑不出来
column6: I need more time to sort through all of them.
You have good taste.

column3: 只挑你看得上眼的告诉我
column6: Only tell me about those that capture your eyes.
This is from State Prince Jinkang.

It is a set of a dozen fans made of
gold-painted silk voile, antler, and bamboo.

column3: 奇就奇在那竹骨触手生凉
column6: The most marvelous thing is that the bamboo feels so cool on your hands,
just like jade.
And there's this.

column3: 沛国公府送来的文犀辟毒筷
column6:
The Duke of Pei gifted poison-detecting chopsticks
made of grooved rhinoceros horn.
Although silver chopsticks can also detect poison,
they are far less precious than these.

column3: 用毒之人最狠毒无比防不胜防
column6:
People who use poison are the most insidious.
You can never be too vigilant.
The Duke of Pei is thoughtful to offer these.
Is it the Duke of Pei from the Meng family?
Yes.
His daughter, Meng Jingxian,

column3: 原是要指给十七爷的那一位
column6: was to be betrothed to Lord XVII.
I wonder if she is married already.
Not yet.

column3: 孟小姐一心思慕十七爷
column6: Miss Meng admires Lord XVII wholeheartedly.

column3: 至今都不愿出阁 都成老姑娘了
column6:
She still "hasn't stepped out of her maiden's chamber."
Now she is an old maid.

Does she think she can marry Lord XVII
by waiting until she's old?

column3: 天下仰慕王爷的女子那么多
column6: His Lordship has so many admirers.

column3: 恐怕王爷连她的眉毛鼻子
column6: I bet His Lordship has never even looked at her brows and eyes.
Why are you so angry?
Your remarks are so callous.

column3: 奴婢就是看不惯她这副样子
column6: I just can't stand the way she is.

She's scared there might be people who
don't know she is waiting for him.
It embarrasses His Lordship.

column3: 这贺礼送来送去就这些东西
column6: The gifts are all about the same.

column3: 把那些寻常玩意儿收起来
column6:
Put away the common ones
so we can reward them to others.
The other gifts are not worth mentioning.

column3: 这果郡王府送来的珊瑚手钏
奴婢瞧着真是精致得不得了
column6:
In my eyes, this coral bracelet from
Noble Prince Guo is most exquisite.

"Coral is not to be cherished in the palm of your hand;
It is to be enshrined as a flower in the Shangyang Palace."
My Lady.

column3: 左右皇上今晚宿在敬妃那儿
column6: His Majesty will stay with Consort Estime tonight.
Meizhuang is not feeling well.
We shall go visit her.

Peace to Noble Consort Lumière.
Stop the litter.
Peace to you as well, Noble Lady Paix.

column3: 贵人好雅兴出来散心呢
column6: I see you are out enjoying the pleasant night.
I'm just taking a short walk.

column3: 等下回去抱我的团绒休息便了
column6: I shall return shortly to cuddle with Velvet Ball and sleep.
Velvet Ball is such an adorable cat.
I'm wondering if she's grown larger.
If Your Highness is interested,

column3: 不如移步去嫔妾的春禧殿坐坐
column6: why not stop by my Hall of Spring Joy?
I wonder if Your Highness will deign to grace my humble abode?

column3: 但娘娘动辄无数人跟着
column6: However, Your Highness is attended by so many servants;
I'm afraid they will frighten my Velvet Ball into silence.
As Your Highness knows

column3: 团绒最妙的便是它的叫声
column6: the best thing about Velvet Ball is her meow.
Under this intoxicating moonlight,

column3: 若不趁兴同游当真是辜负了
column6: it would be a shame if I do not join you.
Jade, help me up.
It is quite rare to receive your invitation.

column3: 那本宫就去贵人处坐坐吧
column6: I shall pay a visit to your residence.
You all don't need to follow us.
What do you want?
Do not underestimate this dagger, Your Highness.

column3: 一只不知好歹的豹子所伤
column6: I was attacked by a reckless leopard once.

column3: 嫔妾便偷偷潜入那豹苑
column6: I then sneaked into its cave,
and slit its throat.

column3: 碧姑娘若不小心叫出来
column6: If Jade finds herself screaming,
then this very dagger

column3: 也会不小心割断熹贵妃的喉咙
column6: may find itself slitting Consort Lumière's throat.
There is no need to terrify Jade.
You lured me here
and allowed Jade to accompany us.
You must have a thorough plan.
Brilliant, Your Highness.
If I lose all constraint and kill Your Highness and your servant,

column3: 失手杀了娘娘和您的侍女

column6: the Pavilion of Twining Reeds is right up ahead -

column3: 我大可推到祺贵人身上
column6: I can easily turn Lady Délice into my scapegoat.

column3: 反正祺贵人想杀娘娘的心
column6:
After all, it's not just recently
she developed the desire to kill Your Highness.
I might as well grant her this wish.
Don't you also harbor hatred against me?

column3: 否则何必让团绒引来那么多猫
column6:
Otherwise, why would you allow Velvet Ball
to attract so many cats,

column3: 来要本宫和腹中孩儿的性命
column6: trying to take my life and the lives of my children?
Your Highness was aware of that,

column3: 还能隐忍嫔妾这么久了
column6: yet you tolerated me for so long.

column3: 本宫也不想为难你一片痴心
column6: I didn't want to give you trouble over your devoted love.
But now you are a favored concubine of His Majesty.

column3: 若因果郡王而杀了本宫
column6: It's not worthwhile to kill me
for the sake of Noble Prince Guo.
So you knew.

column3: 贵人爱合欢花逾越自己的性命
column6: You love the "coupling joy" flowers more than your own life.
Someone also told me that
Noble Prince Guo sent an imperial doctor to save you
when you were alone and on the brink of death years ago.

column3: 可他若知道自己救了个蛇蝎女子
column6: I wonder what he will think if he finds out he saved a woman
"as vicious as the snakes and scorpions".
His Lordship made a great effort to save your life,
but you are so vile!
Are you even worthy to admire His Lordship?

column3: 怎么方才你家小主说我害她之时
column6: You weren't angry when your mistress said I harmed her,

column3: 说起王爷你便如此情急呀
column6: why become agitated when His Lordship is mentioned?
You!
You demoness!
If I am a demoness,

column3: 那熹贵妃岂不成了妖孽之首了
column6:
does that not make Noble Consort Lumière
the head of all demons?
Your fate led you to be with him -
but you were insatiable.
You bewitched the Emperor and returned.
In Your Highness's heart,

column3: 天家富贵就真的胜过于

column6:
does the imperial status and opulence really surpass
His Lordship's love and devotion?
Ever since I met His Lordship,

I've only known that he's the most
gallant and free-spirited man under Heaven.

column3: 从未见他如此受挫潦倒憔悴
column6: I've never seen him so frustrated, dispirited, and haggard.
My suspicions were aroused
the moment Your Highness returned to the Palace.
And at the Mid-Autumn Festival banquet...
You were the one eavesdropping that night.
And what of it?

column3: 你觉得我不配喜欢王爷对吗
column6: Do you think I am unworthy to admire His Lordship?
But you, Noble Consort Lumière, are even less worthy of him!
If I kill you,

column3: 又少了一个负心的人罢了
column6: it will just remove one more heartless woman from this world.

column3: 我家小主要是有什么差池的话
column6: You will also be taking His Lordship's life
if anything happens to My Lady.

column3: 这些年来只有王爷对我最好
column6: All these years, only His Lordship has treated me well.

column3: 所以一切让他伤心的人都该死
column6: Therefore, anyone who hurts him deserves to die.

column3: 你若不容我只怕也伤了他
column6: If you don't spare me, you will harm him as well.
It's not that I don't want to spare you.

It's just that there is no place
for unfaithful people under Heaven.
How would you know...

column3: 有时这负比不负要艰辛多了
column6: Sometimes, unfaithfulness is its own punishment.

column3: 哪儿来的这是哪儿来的
column6: Where...? Where did you get this?

column3: 这珊瑚手钏曾是数年前
column6: This coral bracelet is from the South Sea;

column3: 王爷从南海求得的心爱之物
column6: it was His Lordship's prized possession.
He has never shown it to anyone.
Why do you have this?

column3: 这话你应该问这手钏的主人
column6: You should ask the owner of this bracelet.
Your Lordship...
You owe her nothing.

column3: 为什么对她如此放不下
column6: Why are you unable to move on?
Forget it.

column3: 王爷既然把心都掏给了你
column6: His Lordship gave you his heart.
If you have any sense of conscience at all
you should condemn yourself every day.
The kind treatment I received from His Lordship

column3: 在你看来或许根本不算什么
column6: might be absolutely nothing in your eyes.
However, to me ...

column3: 已是这毕生不可得的温暖
column6: it is warmth I will never again embrace in my life.
I'm letting you go today

column3: 就算报答王爷昔年之恩吧
column6: to repay His Lordship's kindness to me.
What a lunatic!
No harm was done.

column3: 罢了 甯贵人也是至情至性之人
column6: Lady Paix went to extremes for her passion and emotions.
Noble Consort Lumière has great good fortune indeed.

column3: 一对龙凤胎算是保了她
column6: The "dragon and phoenix twins" have secured
her a lifetime of honor and riches.
Just giving birth is nothing to be proud of.
We'll see if she is capable of bringing them up.

column3: 祺妹妹这话说得好轻巧
column6: Easy for you to say that, Délice.
Certainly.
An, you are of ill omen.

column3: 惠嫔怀着胎都忌讳着您
column6: Even Concubine Vertu avoids you while she's pregnant.

column3: 要是有您去熹贵妃宫里多晃晃
column6: If you walk around Noble Consort Lumière's palace more often,

column3: 熹贵妃的孩子还活得了吗
column6: I wonder if her children can stay alive.
Silence, both of you!

column3: 一个一个嘴上功夫了得
column6: Both of you are so good with words
but cannot talk yourselves into His Majesty's favor.
Noble Lady Délice, since you were released from confinement

you haven't been able to restore
His Majesty's favor for you.

column3: 安嫔你被天象所困那么久
column6:
Concubine An, you've been trapped by
 this astrological situation for so long
and have shown no ability to save yourself.

Neither of you can make yourself helpful to me.
All you do is bicker.
What's the use of you two?
Use your wits well.

column3: 否则这后宫便是她甄环的了
column6: Otherwise, this whole harem will be taken by Zhen Huan!
That bitch! She dared compete with me!

column3: 安嫔你这样卑微的身份
column6: Concubine An, you come from such lowly beginnings
yet you've been on equal footing with me for so long.
I've tolerated you enough.
My Lady, your sleep tonic is ready.
Drink it before you retire to bed.
Coua...
Coua!
Coua!
My voice!

column3: 我的嗓子怎么成这样了
column6: What happened to my voice?
My Lady, what happened to you?

column3: 我的嗓子我再也不能得宠了
column6: My voice... without it I will never gain favor again.
Coua.

column3: 小主一定是有人故意害您的
column6: My Lady, someone did this to you.
I'm going to inform Her Majesty.
I'm going to beg her to help us.
Don't go!

column3: 我能得宠全靠这副嗓子了
column6: My voice is all I have to gain His Majesty's favor.

column3: 若是被人知道我嗓子成了这样
column6: If anyone finds out what happened to my voice,

column3: 皇上肯定不会再喜欢我了
column6: His Majesty will surely no longer care for me.

column3: 到时我就成了一枚弃子
column6: Then I will become a useless pawn.
A discarded pawn!

column3: 宝鹃记住我只是得了风寒
column6: Coua, remember this: I only caught a cold.
I will recover shortly.

column3: 奴婢知道 奴婢知道了
column6: I understand, My Lady.
Your Highness, look!

- Elder sister!
- Yurao!

- My Second Lady!
- Peace to Your Noble Highness.
Yurao, let me get a good look at you.

column3: 一别数年如今相见是高兴事
column6:
It is a joyous occasion to finally reunite
 after so many years,
so why are you crying, elder sister?
Sister Jade.
My Second Lady has grown a lot taller.
His Majesty is so happy for Your Highness

column3: 特意请娘娘的家人入宫来相见
column6: that he especially invited Your Highness's family to the palace.
His Majesty also said

column3: 请二小姐安心地在宫里住下
column6: your sister should feel comfortable staying in the palace
to keep Your Highness company.
Where are my parents?
Are they here as well?

column3: 老大人还在京中养病呢
column6: Mr. Zhen is still recuperating in the capital.

column3: 皇上已下旨召夫人入京
column6:
His Majesty has also summoned your mother
and sister back to Beijing.

column3: 二小姐日夜兼程地先过来了
column6:
Your sister traveled day and night
to put Your Highness at peace.

column3: 老大人和夫人也能在京中相聚了
column6:
I believe both Mr. and Lady Zhen
will be able to see each other in a few days.

column3: 皇上的心意本宫心领了
column6: I appreciate His Majesty's kind intentions.

column3: 只是本宫家父仍是罪臣
column6: However, my father is still a guilty official.

Although His Majesty granted them the grace
to be summoned back to the capital,
what does this achieve
besides adding to their fatigue?

column3: 皇上虽未让老大人官复原职
column6: Although His Majesty did not restore Mr. Zhen's old position,
he has ordered your family's former residence to be renovated

column3: 好让老大人和夫人能留在京里
column6: so your parents can reside in the capital
and happily enjoy their years ahead.
I understand.
I will thank His Majesty for his grace tomorrow.
You may take your leave now.
Yes. There's one more matter.
Lord XVII said
that in congratulations of Your Highness's promotion,

column3: 只把凝晖堂内所有的合欢花
column6:
he grants Your Highness all of the "coupling joy" trees
in the Hall of Converging Light
in addition to the other gifts.
His Lordship said,

column3: 合欢花最能安五脏和心志
column6:
the "coupling joy" flower is excellent at soothing
the five organs and the mind.

column3: 娘娘日后折来赏玩也好
column6: Your Highness may enjoy the beauty of the flowers
or cook them with porridge.
He hopes you won't let them go to waste.

column3: 王爷的心意本宫心领了
column6: I acknowledge His Lordship's thoughtfulness.
Please convey my thanks to His Lordship.

column3: 这位王爷心思倒也别致
column6: This Lord XVII has a uniquely thoughtful mind.
He is unlike others,
who only present gold or jade.
This is your first day in the palace, My Second Lady.
You probably have no idea

column3: 心思奇绝的地方多了去了
column6: how unconventional Lord XVII is.
Before Your Highness returned,

column3: 把宫中的永宝堂打扫出来
column6:
I had already ordered some servants to clear out
the Hall of Eternal Treasure
where My Second Lady will reside.
Wonderful.

We need not stand out here any longer.
 Let's all go inside.
I shall take my leave.

column3: 皇上昨夜批了一夜的摺子
column6: Your Majesty was reading memorandums all night.
It is much too tiring.

column3: 熹贵妃忙于照顾一对儿女
column6:
Noble Consort Lumière is busy
taking care of two children.
It is inconvenient for her to serve Your Majesty.

column3: 后宫还有许多年轻的妃嫔都很好
column6: There are many brilliant and youthful concubines in the harem.

column3: 皇上也可以经常走一走
column6: Perhaps Your Majesty can pay them more visits as well.

column3: 朕听说安嫔吃伤了东西
column6: I heard Concubine An got sick from something she ate.
Her voice has been ruined.
I'm afraid she is not capable of singing anymore.
What a shame.
At first, it was just a cold.
She could have recovered in a few days.

column3: 谁知药吃下去反而伤了喉咙
column6:
Who would've thought that her medicine
could hurt her throat even more.

column3: 只怕以后连话都不能好好说了
column6:
I fear she might not even be able
to talk properly in the future.
Well then, let her take time to recuperate.

column3: 朕倒是有日子没去惠嫔那儿了
column6: I haven't visited Concubine Vertu in a while.
Huan Huan has already given birth.

column3: 就等着眉庄的好消息了
column6: We're all waiting for Meizhuang's good news.
Lumière.
Who is it?

- Lumière.
- Lower the sedan.
Lower the sedan chair.
Peace to Noble Consort Lumiere.
After just a few months, have you forgotten me, Lumiere?
Not that I forgot you.

column3: 只是见妹妹身子如此单弱
column6: It's just that seeing you so weak and feeble....
Your disappointment must be colder than this bitter weather.

I've seen how people change like the weather
and grown used to them belittling me.
I'm not afraid of being disappointed.

His Majesty ordered you to recuperate alone
and avoid seeing people.
Why today, did you decide to come out?
Others avoid me fearing my ill omen.

column3: 姐姐却最清楚我是否不祥
column6: You know best whether I carry bad fortune
and what my misfortune truly is.
I meant only to express concern for your well-being.
Why do you say you're bad luck?

It saddens me to hear
such self-contempt and self-degradation.
Your circumstance is already inconvenient.

column3: 为何还装了这么多心思在心里
column6: Why insist on coming out to speak of such burdensome thoughts?
Perhaps your current predicament

column3: 安知不是素日操心太过
column6: was caused by over-exerting your mind.

column3: 姐姐本知我是轻贱之人
column6: You know that I come from lowly origins.

There are so many noble people in this world,
making me all the more insignificant.
I can only strive to become stronger.
It is definitely good to stengthen oneself.

column3: 只是别用错心机 枉顾性命就好
column6: Just not in an immoral way that costs innocent lives.

column3: 人心不足 机关算尽
column6: If one plots every step of the way and becomes insatiable,

column3: 往往过分自强便成了自戕
column6: excessive self-strengthening will become self-harm.
Now no one is stronger than you in the palace,

column3: 也没有比陵容更无用无依的人了
column6: whereas no one is more abject and abandoned than me.
You are the most blessed person, Lumière.

column3: 陵容只有沾沾姐姐的福气
column6:
I can turn peril into safety
if I can dip myself in your good fortune.

column3: 有了姐姐我还怕什么呢
column6: With you as my sister, what would I fear?
I wish your auspicious words would come true.

column3: 妹妹对本宫是何等姐妹情深
column6:
I certainly remember how, as my sister,
you treated me with such deep affection.

column3: 必然滴水之恩涌泉相报
column6: I will "repay every drop of 'kindness' with a fountain of gratitude."
You can count on me for this.
I also feel the same way.
Judging from her voice, her throat is truly ruined.
I don't know if it was ordained by Heaven or arranged by man.
My Lady, now that she's lost favor,
it's a good chance for us to send her off quietly.

column3: 在宫中死是最好的解脱
column6: In the palace, death is the best way out.

column3: 她深受皇宠多年又性子要强
column6:
She enjoyed His Majesty's favor for many years
and has a strong character.
Now that she lost favor and is humiliated,

column3: 当真比死还叫她难受百倍
column6:
life is a hundred times more agonizing
than death for her.
I understand.

column3: 奴婢一定会知会各宫娘娘小主
column6: I will inform the other concubines to take good care of Concubine An.

column3: 你们干什么呀干什么呀
column6: What are you doing? What are you doing?
Damaging the room of Her Highness?
Stop putting up talismans!  Stop!

column3: 我们也是为安嫔你好啊
column6: Concubine An, we are doing this for your own good.
Even His Majesty said you're bad luck.

column3: 我们姐妹特意去宝华殿
column6: We made a special trip to the Baohua Hall

column3: 给你求了符纸和符水来驱邪
column6: to get talisman papers and water to drive out evil spirits.
Put up more talismans.
Don't forget the quilt and cabinet.
What on earth are you doing?
Don't spray the water!
Are you all out of your mind?
Even if Her Highness is inauspicious,

column3: 也轮不到你们来延禧宫吵闹
column6:
it is not your place to disturb
the Palace of Prolonging Happiness.
Concubine An bears ill fortune which harms the harem.
Therefore it concerns everyone.

column3: 符纸不烧又怎么会有效呢
column6: The talismans won't be effective if they are not burned.
Burn them quickly.

My Lady, as expected, Concubine Fidèle
and Attendant Kang

went to the Palace of Prolonging Happiness
 and created a disturbance.
Does the Empress know about this?
She probably does.
But she didn't inquire about it any further.

column3: 别理她日后还有的闹呢
column6: Just let them be. There's more to come.
My Lady, the charcoal has run out.

column3: 您先抱个汤婆子暖暖吧
column6: Please use this hot water bottle to warm yourself.
We only have a little hot water remaining
and we also need to drink and wash our faces.
How can we afford to use it in hot water bottles?
It snowed several times and is getting colder and colder.

column3: 能盖的被子奴婢都给您盖上了
column6: I have covered you with all the quilts we have.

column3: 若是没有地龙可真要冻死了
column6:
We would freeze to death if it were not for
 the underground heating.
Would anybody know if we freeze to death here?
My Lady.
How has Your Highness been doing?
Concubine Fidèle and I have been thinking of you.
What are you up to this time?
We brought some charcoal for you

since we are all sisters
and we know you don't have enough.
Bring it in.
Light it.

column3: 这冰天雪地的可怎么熬过去呀
column6: How can you survive the cold and the snow without charcoal?
But Concubine An, you need to understand that
times have changed.

column3: 我们姐妹也没什么好炭能送的
column6: We can't afford to give you any high-quality charcoal.
You'll have to make do with this.

column3: 别点了 别点了 呛死人了
column6: Stop! Stop! The smoke is suffocating.

column3: 快点 点上 不点怎么能暖和
column6:
Quick, get the fire going!
Otherwise how can you get warm?

column3: 本宫以延禧宫主位的身份
column6:
As the head of the Palace of Prolonging Happiness,
I order you to leave
and stop your misbehavior here!

column3: 你还以为自己是得宠的安嫔哪
column6: Do you still think you're the favored Concubine An?
Forget about that.

column3: 过得连我的宫女都不如
column6: Your life now is worse than my servants.
"Don't wave a chicken feather like a commander's arrow!"
Stop making noise!
The Empress Dowager is sick and needs rest.
Who dares to make a scene here?

column3: 皇后娘娘听说了延禧宫的事
column6: Her Majesty the Empress is aware of what has happened here,
so she ordered me to deliver her decree.

column3: 延禧宫的宫女不能护主
column6:
The servants of the Palace of Prolonging Happiness
were unable to protect their mistress.
They will forfeit one month's stipend.

column3: 不能劝谏小主雪天胡闹
column6:
The servants of Concubine Fidèle and Attendant Kang
failed to persuade their mistresses not to make trouble.

- They are penalized with a fine of three months' stipend.
- Yes.
Take this away quickly.
My Lady, please be assured.

column3: 娘娘虽然也在困顿之中
column6: Although Her Majesty is also in a difficult situation,

column3: 可是从来没有忘记过小主
column6: she has never forgotten about you.

column3: 这不让奴婢带来了棉被和炭火
column6:
She bade me bring you quilts and charcoal
so you won't have these worries over the winter.

column3: 小主也好安心过冬了呀

column6: I thank Her Majesty for her benevolence.
Sparrow, take them.
Yes.

column3: 小主自打嗓子坏了以后
皇上可就再没提起您呢
column6:
Ever since your throat became damaged,
 His Majesty has not mentioned you.

column3: 小主也该想个新的出路啊
column6: My Lady, you need to find a new path forward.
Your Majesty.
Is it done?
Yes.
"Adding flowers to the brocade" never earns you true gratitude.

column3: 雪中送炭才让人记得好处呢
column6:
"Sending charcoal on a snowy day"
makes people remember your kindness.

column3: 奴婢把该讲的话都讲给安嫔听了
column6: I've told her all that should be said.
Hopefully she will learn from it.

column3: 一个人只有到了绝境才懂得反抗
column6: Only when one is in a desperate situation
do they learn to fight back and press ahead without hesitating.

column3: 本宫让你教她是成全她
column6: I'm helping her by asking you to advise her.

column3: 反正祺贵人已经下手了
column6: Since Noble Lady Délice has already made this move,

column3: 安嫔的嗓子也很难再好了
column6: Concubine An's throat is unlikely to recover.

column3: 本宫就干脆让她全坏了吧
column6: I might as well ruin it once and for all.

column3: 连甯贵人的鹦鹉都懂得吟诗了
column6: Even the parrot of Noble Lady Paix can recite poems now.

column3: 她也该想想别的出路了
column6: Concubine An should think of a new strategy.
Your Majesty is wise.

Translators: The Magpie Bridge Brigade 鹊桥小队翻译组
https://magpiebridgebrigade.cn
Twitter/FB/IG @BrigadeMagpie 公众号/微博: 鹊桥小队翻译组

column3:
Theme: The Lonely Phoenix
[phoenix is the symbol of an empress]
column6:
Theme: The Phoenix Taking Flight
[phoenix is the symbol of an empress]

column3:
I dimly recall the colorful blooms in every summer.
They are as distant as the autumn moon in the water.
column6:
The dreams I dimly recall;
The past I hardly remember,
amidst the autumn moons and the spring flowers.
Like the moon's reflection on water
or flowers seen through mist - floating and drifting.

column3:
He loved me with a volatile heart.
And before I knew it, we fell apart.

Behind me are the promises and longing.
Before me lie the flute and the zither.

I loved you with my body and soul
But you hurt me from head to toe.

My wish ran athwart
and I ended up a fool of my destiny.
column6:
My wish ran against my will.
Behold the mockery of destiny and the game of fate.

column3: My love was the wind-swept flowers from a tree.
column6:
My unwavering love is gone
like flowers swept away in the wind.

column3:
A plum bloomed in winter hoping for a fruitful summer.
But the irresistible winds of destiny destroyed her wish.

You can hear the flapping of a phoenix
but you will never see it.
column6:
A phoenix about to take flight rustles its wings
but the arc of its flight is unseen.

column3: What you see is the falling leaves from the phoenix tree.
column6:
The phoenix tree sways in the wind,
shedding memories in the whispers of the falling leaves.

column3: The falling leaves from the phoenix tree.
column6:
The phoenix tree sways in the wind,
shedding memories in the whispers of the falling leaves.
